short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just type 'perplexity.ai' in the URL bar, press Tab, and start your search. No more navigating to Perplexity manually to search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just type 'perplexity.ai' in the Chrome URL bar, press Tab, and start your search.

This extension lets you start your Perplexity AI searches right from the Chrome omnibox, instead of manually having to navigate to Perplexity to start your search.
